chat/build/dev-chat-all-api-calls.title: All API Calls
chat/build/dev-chat-all-api-calls.description: This tutorial is designed to get you up and going by providing a step wise guide to use and explore the Push SDK.

chat/build/docs-chat-develop-conditional.title: Conditional Rules for Group
chat/build/docs-chat-develop-conditional.description: Conditional gating allows you to define rules for the members of the group for different privileges / permissions such as entry or chat. It is driven by Push Chat rules engine which is inspired by json rules engine and allows you to create powerful dynamics guiding communication for your community. Some examples of what you can achieve with it â€”

chat/build/docs-chat-develop-create-grou.title: Create Group
chat/build/docs-chat-develop-create-grou.description: Group chat is the latest exciting addition to Push Chat, for the first time ever, web3 users are finally able to talk to each other in web3 native groups and have fine-grained controls over them allowing new ways by which community can be engaged besides adding new utilities to your token. Group chat enables protocols or web3 projects to create â€”

chat/build/docs-chat-develop-fetch-chats.title: Fetch Chats
chat/build/docs-chat-develop-fetch-chats.description: These APIs are useful for fetching list of all chats (or chat requests) that a user might have, along with providing calls to get latest message or historical messages between two users (or from a group).

chat/build/docs-chat-develop-get-started.title: Get Started
chat/build/docs-chat-develop-get-started.description: Push Chat enables web3 native messaging between wallets, groups, NFTs or even conditional (gated) groups. To do so, you will be using Push SDK API that will abstract away the complexity of authentication, encryption, signing, sending and receiving of messages.

chat/build/docs-chat-develop-group-permi.title: Group Permissions
chat/build/docs-chat-develop-group-permi.description: These APIs help in validating if you have permissions for a gated group.

chat/build/docs-chat-develop-group-reque.title: Group Requests
chat/build/docs-chat-develop-group-reque.description: This section deals with API calls related to joining or leaving a group.

chat/build/docs-chat-develop-initialize-.title: Initialize User
chat/build/docs-chat-develop-initialize-.description: Before you can start sending messages, or create conditional access group for your community, or send those chat requests to Vitalik.eth. you will need to initialize a user or re-authenticate the user. To do so you will use PushAPI.initialize call from @pushprotocol/restapi package.

chat/build/docs-chat-develop-manage-chat.title: Chat Requests
chat/build/docs-chat-develop-manage-chat.description: You can send a message using chat.send API to either an existing chat connection or to initiate a new chat to a wallet you haven't chatted with before (which is called sending a chat request).

chat/build/docs-chat-develop-manage-grou.title: Manage Group
chat/build/docs-chat-develop-manage-grou.description: This section covers all APIs related to managing groups including adding / removing members or admins, updating group info or fetching group info.

chat/build/docs-chat-develop-send-messag.title: Send Message
chat/build/docs-chat-develop-send-messag.description: Push Chat doesn't require a user to be on the network for you to send message ðŸ˜€. Instead, it gives you the freedom to send a nudge to an account or a message (or a meme).

chat/build/docs-chat-develop-stream-chat.title: Stream Chats
chat/build/docs-chat-develop-stream-chat.description: These APIs enable you to receive chat payloads or chat request / group invites in real time without polling the API. Push Chat achieves this by the use of sockets.

chat/build/docs-chat-develop-types-of-re.title: Types of Recipient
chat/build/docs-chat-develop-types-of-re.description: Push Chat is chain agnostic and even supports messaging wallet addresses, NFT addresses, all evms (and even non-EVM in the future). Below is the list of evergrowing standards that Push Chat is compatible with, either of which you can use as per your requirements  â€”

chat/chat.title: Intro to Push Chat
chat/chat.description: Push Chat is a web3 messaging protocol that allows wallet addresses to send and receive messages without the need for traditional personal identifiers like phone numbers, email addresses, etc. It offers an enhanced layer of security and privacy compared to conventional messaging apps and allows for experiences that can only be achieved by native web3 messaging including the ability to create token gated experiences, chat anonymously, tie your communication to your keys and more!

chat/concepts/docs-chat-concepts-archite.title: Push Chat Architecture
chat/concepts/docs-chat-concepts-archite.description: Push Chat is a web3 messaging protocol that enables wallet addresses to send and receive messages, offering a secure and privacy-focused alternative to traditional messaging apps. By leveraging blockchain technology, users can communicate directly via their wallet addresses without personal identifiers like phone numbers, email addresses, etc.

chat/concepts/docs-chat-encryption-versi.title: Encryption Version in Push Chat
chat/concepts/docs-chat-encryption-versi.description: Each Push profile or user of Push Chat has a PGP key that is created locally and stored encrypted on Push nodes. Push SDK during initialization automatically decrypts your key by asking you to sign a nonce which is used to derive the signature that is applied to encrypt or decrypt your PGP keys.

chat/docs-chat-build-section.title: Build
chat/docs-chat-build-section.description: This section covers everything you will require from Push SDK to create any functionality or features related to Push Chat.

chat/docs-chat-concepts-section.title: Concepts
chat/docs-chat-concepts-section.description: Brush up on some crucial concepts that will help you understand Push Chat better.

chat/docs-chat-message-types-section.title: Message Types
chat/docs-chat-message-types-section.description: Each message of Push Chat is a json payload that carries with it a message type and some parameters that enable each frontend that integrates Push Chat to understand and display various message types.

chat/docs-chat-quickstart.title: Quickstart
chat/docs-chat-quickstart.description: Everything you will need to get up and running in 2 mins or less!

chat/docs-chat-tutorials-section.title: Tutorials
chat/docs-chat-tutorials-section.description: Find all tutorials related to Push Chat and more!

chat/docs-chat-ui-components-section.title: UI Components
chat/docs-chat-ui-components-section.description: This Section will show you how you can easily integrate Push Chat, Group Chat and Token Gated Group Chat in your dapp with just few lines of code using our components from @pushprotocol/uiweb

chat/message-types/docs-chat-message-typ.title: File
chat/message-types/docs-chat-message-typ.description: Enables sending single file or attachement as a message. You will need to pass the file as base64. Base64 is a method for encoding binary data into ASCII text.

chat/message-types/docs-chat-message-typ.title: Image
chat/message-types/docs-chat-message-typ.description: Enables sending a single image as a messages to the recipient. You will need to pass the image as base64. Base64 is a method for encoding binary data into ASCII text.

chat/message-types/docs-chat-message-typ.title: Media Embed
chat/message-types/docs-chat-message-typ.description: Enables sending a image URLs or media URLs as a message. You can send GIFs, Tweets, Youtube links, etc. Simply pass in the URL of the media as content.

chat/message-types/docs-chat-message-typ.title: Meta
chat/message-types/docs-chat-message-typ.description: Enables sending arbitary meta actions in a group. This message type has some rules and it's recommeneded to not interact directly with this message type as Push SDK will handle it for you. It's documentated just for the curious minds.

chat/message-types/docs-chat-message-typ.title: Reaction
chat/message-types/docs-chat-message-typ.description: Enables reacting by using emoji to a message.

chat/message-types/docs-chat-message-typ.title: Text
chat/message-types/docs-chat-message-typ.description: Enables sending simple text messages to the recipient.

chat/tutorials/docs-chat-push-sdk-playgr.title: Push SDK Playground
chat/tutorials/docs-chat-push-sdk-playgr.description: This tutorial is designed to get you up and going by providing playground containing all API calls coverage for Push SDK. Checkout Push SDK example that utlizes @pushprotocol/restapi and @pushprotocol/socket for more info!

chat/tutorials/docs-chat-tutorials-push-.title: Push SDK React Playground
chat/tutorials/docs-chat-tutorials-push-.description: This tutorial is designed to get you up and going by providing playground containing all frontend React components coverage. Checkout Push SDK React frontend example that utlizes @pushprotocol/uiweb @pushprotocol/restapi and @pushprotocol/socket for more info!

chat/ui-components/Advanced/ChatProfile.title: ChatProfile
chat/ui-components/Advanced/ChatProfile.description: Empower User Interaction: Showcase Wallet Addresses, Group Names, and Member Management with ChatProfile in Your Dapp.

chat/ui-components/Advanced/ChatUIProvid.title: ChatUIProvider
chat/ui-components/Advanced/ChatUIProvid.description: Enhance State Management: Boost Your Component's Functionality by Wrapping it with ChatUIProvider.

chat/ui-components/Advanced/ChatViewBubb.title: ChatViewBubble
chat/ui-components/Advanced/ChatViewBubb.description: Simplify Development: Instantly Integrate Pre-built Chat Bubble UI for Your Dapp

chat/ui-components/Advanced/ChatViewComp.title: ChatViewComponent
chat/ui-components/Advanced/ChatViewComp.description: Effortless Messaging Integration: Add a Complete Chat Interface to Your Dapp with ChatViewComponent.

chat/ui-components/Advanced/ChatViewList.title: ChatViewList
chat/ui-components/Advanced/ChatViewList.description: Streamlined Chat List Integration: Easily Add a Message List to Your Dapp with Built-in Pagination

chat/ui-components/Advanced/MessageInput.title: MessageInput
chat/ui-components/Advanced/MessageInput.description: Versatile Message Input Integration: Enable Text, Image, File, and Gif Sharing in Your Dapp with MessageInput.

chat/ui-components/UseCase.title: Usecases
chat/ui-components/UseCase.description: Streamline Chat Integration for Developers: Say goodbye to the hassles of UI design and API calls. With our web components available in the @pushprotocol/uiweb package, you can effortlessly integrate push chat functionality into your dapp using just a few lines of code.
